sentences.english: Mr. Prasart hasn’t neglected the more modern, Western-facing Thailand in his collections.
sentences.chinese: P先生沒有忽略更能代表現代西式泰國的藏品。

sentences.english: One cannot overlook his uncanny ability to navigate the many political intrigues and maneuverings.
sentences.chinese: 沒人能忽略他平息各種政治陰謀詭計的稟賦。

sentences.english: And all of this, of course, ignores the benefits of limiting global warming.
sentences.chinese: 而所有這一切都忽略了遏制全球變暖所帶來的好處。

sentences.english: In practice, residual values are ignored if they are not expected to be material in amount.
sentences.chinese: 在實踐中，如果殘值金額預計不大，通常被忽略。

sentences.english: He overlooked the land, which was still a vast expanse of whiteness.
sentences.chinese: 他忽略了土地，這仍然是一個白茫茫。

sentences.english: The Patriots totally misconstrued this passage and ignored its context.
sentences.chinese: 完全曲解這段經文並忽略其上下文。

sentences.english: This error message can be ignored.
sentences.chinese: 這條錯誤消息可以忽略。

sentences.english: P. vivax has been neglected because it is rarely fatal.
sentences.chinese: 間日瘧原蟲被人們忽略，這是由於它很少導致死亡。

sentences.english: Placebos are often overlooked in medical studies.
sentences.chinese: 許多醫學研究常常忽略安慰劑的作用。

sentences.english: has been neglected because it is rarely fatal.
sentences.chinese: 間日瘧原蟲被人們忽略，這是由於它很少導致死亡。

sentences.english: The unseeable is very often ignored.
sentences.chinese: 看不見的東西往往會被忽略。

sentences.english: The current implementation of this rule ignores menu items.
sentences.chinese: 此規則的目前實作會忽略功能表項目。

sentences.english: When dharma is neglected, troubles begin.
sentences.chinese: 當達爾瑪被忽略時，麻煩就開始了。

sentences.english: The makers of navigation devices have not ignored the spread of smartphones.
sentences.chinese: 導航設備製造商們並沒有忽略向智能手機的延伸。

sentences.english: Using period of economy in silt-trap dam is longer, time value can not be neglected.
sentences.chinese: 淤地壩的經濟使用期較長，時間價值不宜忽略。

sentences.english: Both of these errors can be safely ignored.
sentences.chinese: 這兩個錯誤都可以安全地忽略。

definition: usually/in many cases/more often than not
to remember/to bear in mind/to learn by heart
to take note of/to pay attention to
